thread.title: Denise
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text: I saw the ad for the new store. I wanted to freshen up our living room. I went by Home Zone, Havertys and Ashleys furniture. The staff was friendly and helpful and I found exactly what I was looking for. Sergio, JB, Jesus and the others made for a pleasant shopping experience.
